This week we have a great special running on our Fully Managed VPS Hosting Packages including our Premium 24/7 USA Support Staff, Dedicated IP Address & Global 1Gbps Network.

WebNet Hosting is proud to offer 50% off the first month for all new VPS orders.
During checkout, use promotional code VPSOFF to get 50% OFF THE FIRST MONTH of your new VPS Order.

- and over 100 hosting features
- Free Setup & No Hidden Fees

About WebNet Hosting!
WebNet Hosting has been providing web hosting services for eCommerce and Video related websites since 2002. We host over 10,000 websites worldwide. We focus in providing our customers with Superior 24/7 Support. Our Technical support department is located in Arlington VA.
